page.title: 05FARMING AND EDUCATION
page.content: {NAFFERTON}PRODUCES MAINLY MILK AND CEREALS.IT HAS{150}COWS BRED ON THE FARM BY MEANS OF A.I.MALE ANIMALS ARE KEPT FOR 12 MONTHS FOR BEEF THEN SENT TO MARKET.ONE FIFTH OF THE COWS ARE REPLACED EACH YEAR.HILL SHEEP ARE OVER WINTERED FOR THE HILL FARMERS.CEREAL PRODUCTION USES{400}ACRES ON A 6 OR 8 YEAR ROTATION PROGRAMME.ONE FIELD OF GRASS IS TAKEN OUT PERIODICALLY FOR CEREALS AND VICE_VERSA.{2}CROPS OF WHEAT A YEAR ARE GROWN,THE FIRST GOES FOR MILLING,THE SECOND FOR WINTER FEED BARLEY IS ALSO GROWN TWICE,THE WINTER GIVING THE HIGHEST YIELD.OIL SEED RAPE IS THE THIRD AND NEWEST CROP.THE SEED IS CRUSHED FOR OIL,WHAT REMAINS IS FED BACK TO THE CATTLE.ALL BRITISH COOKING OIL MADE FROM THE SEEDS IS NOW AVAILABLE IN LOCAL SHOPS, IT IS A LIGHT GENERAL PURPOSE OIL.
